description: Nick has been away from the game for awhile while he was deployed and you can tell he's anxious to get back to business.  It's a little awkward for him at first I think but he starts out all smiles and ready for fun.  He and Bryce (in a separate scene) give each other some head and then Bryce proceeds to fuck him pretty good.  It turns out to be a hurt that feels so good and breaks Nick back in for things.  They go at it raw and Bryce ends up fucking the shit out of Nick.The next day Nick stops by again and meets the same fate with Brock who is at Mike's hotel room waiting for some action.  I guess Mike (or Nick) decided that this was going to be the weekend to get Nick's ass torn apart.  Brock does a repeat from the Friday mid-day sexcapade and give it to Nick raw once more.
title: Brock & Nick
